import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from sklearn.cluster import KMeans
import seaborn as sns; sns.set()
import csv
source.7144bc60:
K_Hardware = range(1,10)
kmeans = [KMeans(n_clusters=i) for i in K_Hardware]
Y_axis = df_bank[['campaign']]
X_axis = df_bank[['pdays']]
score = [kmeans[i].fit(Y_axis).score(Y_axis) for i in range(len(kmeans))]
# Visualize
plt.plot(K_Hardware, score)
plt.xlabel('Number of Hardware')
plt.ylabel('Score')
plt.title('Elbow Curve')
plt.show()
source.0a26cb76:
kmeans = KMeans(n_clusters = 4, init ='k-means++')
kmeans.fit(X[X.columns[1:3]]) 
X['cluster_label'] = kmeans.fit_predict(X[X.columns[1:3]])
centers = kmeans.cluster_centers_ 
labels = kmeans.predict(X[X.columns[1:3]])
source.29529553:
X.plot.scatter(x = 'campaign', y = 'pdays', c=labels, s=50, cmap='viridis')
plt.scatter(centers[:, 0], centers[:, 1], c='black', s=100, alpha=0.5)
